Title: Kaadhal
Writer: Balaji Sakthivel (dialogue), Balaji Sakthivel (screenplay), Balaji Sakthivel (story)
Actors: Bharath Srinivasan, Sandhya, Sukumar, Kadhal Thandapani
Plot: Aishwarya, a convent-girl from a wealthy family in the town of Madurai (Tamil Nadu) falls in love with a young motor-mechanic, Murugan whom she encounters in the street. Faced with the ...
